SEARCH
Package co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.controller

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.controller.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping(name="/api") @Transactional @CrossOrigin(origins="*") public class OrderController extends Object
Handles HTTP requests related to order processing in the ElectroShop API.

This controller is responsible for processing orders submitted by customers. It validates the order details, checks product availability, processes payments, and returns the result of the order processing.

  • Method Details

    • processOrder

      @PostMapping("/pedidos/procesar") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> processOrder(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid InitialOrderDTO orderDTO)
      Processes an order with the information provided in the request.

      This method takes an InitialOrderDTO object from the request body, checks if there are enough products available, processes the payment, and then processes the order. If the order is successfully processed, it returns a ResponseEntity containing a ProcessedOrderDTO. If there are insufficient products, it returns a ResponseEntity with an error message and a 400 status code.

      Parameters:
      orderDTO - the order details submitted by the customer
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the result of the order processing
